DOC.detailed_description: The data gather use retrospective follow-up prospective study group patient , consist adult woman underwent breast reduction surgery Clinic Plastic , Reconstructive Aesthetic Surgery Faculty Comenius University University Hospital Bratislava , Ružinov , time period 2000 May 2014 . The data concerning quality life patient gather use globally standardize questionnaire `` Breast Q questionnaire© '' separate software system evaluation tool `` QScore© '' . The statistical analysis conduct use GraphpadPrism program v. 6.01 . The total number respondent consist 52 people followed-up 12 year .
